title.narrative: South Asia Subregional Economic Cooperation Dhaka-Northwest Corridor Road Project, Phase 2 - Tranche 1

description.narrative: The project will improve the road connectivity and efficiency of Dhaka-Northwest international trade corridor. To ensure the sustainability of the outcome, an associated technical assistance is proposed to assist the government in updating its master plan for roads and improving its planning capacity.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
190 km of road upgraded with climate-resilient design
